data.title: Holiday Inn Berlin
data.text:
By car:

From the autobahn, turn onto the B109 and follow the road. You will find our hotel on the right side. All parking spaces in our hotel’s neighborhood cost an hourly fee. We are happy to reserve a parking place in our garage. Please note that only cars with a maximum size of 5.10m in length, 2.05m in width and 1.60m in height can be parked there.

From Schönefeld airport:

Take the regional express train “RB14” or the S-Bahn 9 in direction to “Spandau Bhf” and get off at the stop “Alexanderplatz”. From there you can reach the M2, which starts in front of the station building. This tram line goes in the direction of “Heinersdorf” to the stop “Erich-Weinert-Straße”. Our hotel is located on the opposite side of the street.

From Tegel airport:

Get on the bus “TXL”, which stops in front of the airport building. This will take you to the stop “Beusselstraße”, from where you have access to the circle line S41. Get off at the stop “Prenzlauer Allee” and follow the street to the left when leaving the train station. You will find our hotel after a short 3 minutes walk on the left side.
